Class BrowseFileButtonListener

java.lang.Object
fr.ferret.controller.BrowseFileButtonListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class BrowseFileButtonListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Listens events of the run button and sends input data to the model
